title: S2: S2, S3, Update Episode – Heartbreak & Hope
description:
June 20, 2019 / Susan, Colin, and Rabia discuss recent rulings and court filings in the cases of Joey Watkins and Dennis Perry. 

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
